SCD40.get_co2: get CO2. Call this at most once every 5 seconds, else last measurement value will be returned
SCD40.get_relative_humidity: get relative humidity. Call this at most once every 5 seconds, else last measurement value will be returned
SCD40.get_temperature: get temperature. Call this at most once every 5 seconds, else last measurement value will be returned
SCD40.start_continuous_measurement: start continuous measurement. Call this before reading measurements
SCD40.stop_continuous_measurement: stop continuous measurement. Call this to stop SCD40 internal measurements
